newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Oct aluminium output down one pct on 1995.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Oct aluminium output down one pct on 1995.

text.p: Brazilian production of primary aluminium during October totalled 100,900 tonnes, the Brazilian Aluminium Association (ABAL) said in a statement.
This was one percent lower than output in October 1995 of 101,900 tonnes, it added.
Total output for the first ten months of 1996 was still however 0.8 percent above that of January/October 1995, reaching 996,100 tonnes as opposed to 988,100 tonnes last year.
-- Caroline Bulloch, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 5074151
